attributes.action: Sign this petition to safe the closure of Acorn's Children's Hospice.
attributes.additional_details: I lost my wife with breast cancer who died at Mount Vernon hospice what a great place she was so happy to be there why because the people there knew what to do and made it a place of peace and they were a great help hospices are the last place Governments seem to support enough is enough look at the spending going on now and put some in HOSPICES.
attributes.background: A Children's Hospice is so important that it should have the support of this Government money can be found for so many other things this should be on top of the list.
